collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (9 total Queries, 9 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql:
select *
        from tbl_users as tu, tbl_position as tp
        where tu.position = tp.posID
        and tu.firm = 10
        and tu.userID != 1

select wpID,wp.added_by,wp.client, wp.auditor, wp.supervisor,wp.audmanager, wp.firm,wp.jobdur,wp.financial_year,wp.end_financial_year,wp.status,wp.remarks,wp.added_on, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c1 as tc1 where tc1.wpID = wp.wpID and tc1.cID = wp.client) as x1, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c2 as tc2 where tc2.wpID = wp.wpID and tc2.cID = wp.client) as x2, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c3 as tc3 where tc3.wpID = wp.wpID and tc3.cID = wp.client) as x3, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c1 as tc1 where tc1.wpID = wp.wpID and tc1.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y1, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c2 as tc2 where tc2.wpID = wp.wpID and tc2.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y2, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c3 as tc3 where tc3.wpID = wp.wpID and tc3.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y3, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Reviewing') as ir, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Checking') as ic, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Approved') as ia, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes') as ti, tc.name as cli, tc.org from tbl_workpaper as wp, tbl_clients as tc where wp.firm = 10 and tc.cID = wp.client and wp.financial_year = '2025'

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query:
select *
        from tbl_users as tu, tbl_position as tp
        where tu.position = tp.posID
        and tu.firm = 10
        and tu.userID != 1

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select wpID,wp.added_by,wp.client, wp.auditor, wp.supervisor,wp.audmanager, wp.firm,wp.jobdur,wp.financial_year,wp.end_financial_year,wp.status,wp.remarks,wp.added_on, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c1 as tc1 where tc1.wpID = wp.wpID and tc1.cID = wp.client) as x1, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c2 as tc2 where tc2.wpID = wp.wpID and tc2.cID = wp.client) as x2, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c3 as tc3 where tc3.wpID = wp.wpID and tc3.cID = wp.client) as x3, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c1 as tc1 where tc1.wpID = wp.wpID and tc1.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y1, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c2 as tc2 where tc2.wpID = wp.wpID and tc2.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y2, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_c3 as tc3 where tc3.wpID = wp.wpID and tc3.cID = wp.client and updated_on IS NOT NULL) as y3, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Reviewing') as ir, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Checking') as ic, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes' and cfi.status = 'Approved') as ia, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_file_index as cfi where cfi.wpID = wp.wpID and cfi.cID = wp.client and cfi.acquired = 'Yes') as ti, tc.name as cli, tc.org from tbl_workpaper as wp, tbl_clients as tc where wp.firm = 10 and tc.cID = wp.client and wp.financial_year = '2025'
